New Records: Yuki Kawamura became the 4th Japanese player to appear in the NBA
Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura hit his first NBA field goal with a step-back three-pointer
The Memphis Grizzlies won 128-104 against the Washington Wizards
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura quickly became a favorite among Memphis fans, who chanted 'We want Yuki!' to demand his insertion off the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: A video of Kawamura's first bucket quickly racked up hundreds of thousands of views on the NBA's official account on X, formerly Twitter
Others: Yuki Kawamura finished with three points on 1-for-3 shooting, also making an assist and grabbing two rebounds in close to five minutes of action
Yuki Kawamura received the game ball for scoring his first NBA points from the free-throw line in a blowout win over the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday
